text: Question 1 An agricultural science student wanted to test the pH of a sample of soil before deciding what crops to sow. pH probe B Universal Indicator C A (a) Identify any two pieces of equipment labelled A, B or C required for this investigation. A: B: C: (b) State the pH of the soil filtrate. (c) State a conclusion the student can make in relation to growing crops.
